O21Toolbox.UpdateListings.UpdateDef.content: Version 1.3.0 - Fixed Conflict with Roads of the Rim. - Added Tweak: Unlocked Meme Buildings - No memes required for buildable ideology stuff. Added Tweak: Glowing Ambrosia - Makes Ambrosia glow so it's easier to spot. Added Tweak: Glowing Healroot - Makes Healroot glow so it's easier to spot. Added Tweak: Wild Reproduction - Wild animals can do the horizontal monster mash. Added Tweak: Hunters Can Use Melee - Speaks for itself. Added Tweak: Boomalopes Bleed Chemfuel - BURN BABAY! Added Tweak: Disfigurement Penalty Multiplier - Ugly is the new Beautiful. Added Tweak: Chatty Comms - Coms Console is a recreation source. Added Tweak: Green Thumb - Restored Green Thumb trait. Added Tweak: Herd Migration - Restored Herd Migration Event. Added Tweak: Not So Wild Berries - Wild Berries now plantable. Added Tweak: Room Size Tolerance - Better room size tolerances. Added Tweak: Silent Doors - Disables the sound of doors opening and closing. Added Tweak: Silent Mining - Disables the sound of mining.

Version 1.2.0 - Added Tweak: Infestation Blocking Floors - Added Tweak: No More Drop Pod Raids - Added Tweak: No More Siege Raids - Added Tweak: No More Sapper Raids - Added Tweak: No More Breacher Raids

Version 1.1.0 - Added Tweak: Megasloth to Megatherium - Reverts the name change. - Added Tweak: Impassable Deep Water - Prevents pawns navigating through deep water tiles. - Added Tweak: Prisoners Don't Have Keys - Control whether or not prisoners and slaves can open doors. - Added Tweak: Next Restock Timer - Shows when a settlement will next restock.
- Updated Tweak: Lag Free Lamps - Now includes darklight torches and braziers, as well as Vanilla Expanded candles and wall torches. - Fixed Bug: Faster Smoothing - Now applies properly based on its setting. - Fixed Bug: Power Usage Tweaks - Vanometric Power Cell now correctly provides instead of drains power. - Fixed Conflict: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structure no longer blocks meme unlimiter.
